content: a simple top down pattern worked at first in row to allow for a small button band then in the round for the main body and sleeve sections incorporates treble clusters as well and treble and double_crochet stitches any dk yarn can be used and colours chosen to suit your personal preference you will need approx 1 skein of 100g dk yarn of your choosing and a 4mm hook scissors and 2 x 10 or 15mm buttons
